T02D2214:202a-1: a'arya n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni s'a dha no pi ka d'i k'a n'a ma /
T02D2214:202a-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2214:202a-4: gyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa'i
T02D2214:202a-5: 'grel pa / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2214:202b-0: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo @202b skems mdzad pa //
T02D2214:202b-1: mthu ldan bde ba chen po bdag nyid de //
T02D2214:202b-2: nyi zla lta bu'i thugs mda' ba'i //
T02D2214:202b-3: bcom ldan bde chen thugs rje chen po'i dang //
T02D2214:202b-4: sman mchog rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2214:202b-5: rang bzhin rig pa stong pa chen po'i dang //
T02D2214:202b-6: gnyug ma bde ba snying rje chen po'i dang //
T02D2214:202b-7: bde ba chen po'i mtha' bral rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
T02D2214:202b-8: phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin 'bras bu dngos //
T02D2214:202b-9: thob pa'i lam ni yod dang med ba yi //
T02D2214:202b-10: phyag rgya bzhi po lam gyis grol ba'o //
T02D2214:202b-11: dga' bzhi stong pa'i rang bzhin chen po ni //
T02D2214:202b-12: stong pa bdag med lam gyis grol zhes gsung //
T02D2214:202b-13: de bzhin tshogs lam drod dang rtse mo bzod pa lam //
T02D2214:202b-14: 'jig rten chos dang mthong lam dang //
T02D2214:202b-15: bsgom pa mtha' phyin lam gyis ni //
T02D2214:202b-16: gnas pa'i ye shes byang chub ngo bo'i lam //
T02D2214:202b-17: mthong zhing grol bar bla ma chen po gsungs //
T02D2214:202b-18: rgyu 'bras gnyis med gsang sngags bla med lam //
T02D2214:202b-19: 'bras bu dmigs bcas gsang ba bla med lam //
T02D2214:202b-20: lam la goms pas 'bras bu gsang sngags lam //
T02D2214:202b-21: 'bras bu'am 'dir ni rgyu ni ngo shes pa //
T02D2214:202b-22: de yang bla ma chen po'i 'bras bu rtogs //
T02D2214:202b-23: lam med 'bras bu mchog tu bdag gi gzhung gis rtogs //
T02D2214:202b-24: rgyu ni rgyu las 'bras bu 'byin pas te //
T02D2214:202b-25: lam lnga rnam pas pha rol thob pa ste //
T02D2214:202b-26: mthong spangs sgom spangs 'bras bu thob spangs pa //
T02D2214:202b-27: bden pa bzhi ni nyon mongs gnyen po'o //
T02D2214:202b-28: rtsa ba nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
T02D2214:202b-29: bden pa rnams kyis zhing ni grol bar 'dod //
T02D2214:202b-30: bden pa gnyis la rab gnas 'bras bu sngags kyi tshul //
T02D2214:202b-31: bskyed rdzogs mthar phyin thabs dang shes rab bo //
T02D2214:202b-32: ye shes lnga yi lam la gnas pas 'bras bu grol ba'o //
T02D2214:202b-33: de la rtsa ba'i don bshad par 'dod pas /
T02D2214:202b-35: sgron ma bya phyir sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2214:202b-36: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin btud de //
T02D2214:202b-39: sems ba'i bag chags kyis skye ba gcig tu len pa'i phyir 'gro ba'o //
T02D2214:202b-40: sems can ni nyon mongs pa'i yid can te /
T02D2214:202b-41: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa can te /
T02D2214:203a-1: ni rdul dang mun pa snying stobs la sogs te //
T02D2214:203a-2: mthong bsgom nyon mongs pas kun nas dkris te bcings pa'o //
T02D2214:203a-3: 'thoms pa ni las dang las kyi 'bras bu mi shes pa ste ma rig pas so //
T02D2214:203a-4: de'i sgron ma bya phyir ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen
T02D2214:203a-5: po bden pa rnams kyis rang bzhin gsang sngags gzhung
T02D2214:203a-6: 'di nyid de / skyed pa la sogs stong pa nyid kyi nyon mongs pa zag bzad pa ni /
T02D2214:203a-7: thabs gsal bar bstan pa ni sgron ma'o //
T02D2214:203a-8: sgrub thabs ni 'grub pa dang 'grub par byed pa ste don thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2214:203a-9: dpal ldan ni yon tan rnam pa gnyis te rgyu dang 'bras bu las grub cing smin pa'o //
T02D2214:203a-10: rdo rje ni don rtags gsum ste //
T02D2214:203a-11: stong pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2214:203a-12: de'i rang bzhin ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa ni 'dzin cing 'chang ba'o //
T02D2214:203a-13: btud pa ni gzhung bkra shis shing mdzes pa dang 'jug pa dang thob pa'o //
T02D2214:203a-14: lus ngag yid kyis yon tan gsum dang ldan pa'i yi dam lha la dang la btud ces so //
T02D2214:203a-15: mchog rab snying pos rim bzhin bshad na /
T02D2214:203a-16: slob dpon gyi man ngag las gzhung gi don mchog rab kyis bris pa'i don to //
T02D2214:203a-17: sngags pa yon tan kun ldan pas //
T02D2214:203a-18: shin tu yid 'ong bde gnas su //
T02D2214:203a-20: / sngags pa ni rigs kyi bu'am /
T02D2214:203a-21: rigs kyi bu mo rin po che rigs kyi gang
T02D2214:203a-22: zag dad pa gsum dang ldan pa yongs su bzung
T02D2214:203a-23: ngo // yon tan kun dang ldan pa ni dbang thob cing ma nor bar //
T02D2214:203a-24: dam tshig sngom pa gsum dang don gyi rang bzhin ma nor bar mthong ba dang lam shes pa'o//
T02D2214:203a-25: shin tu yid 'ong bde gnas ni grags pas ma smad pa la /
T02D2214:203a-26: byang skyob shar dma' lho gzhol nus dbye ba'o //
T02D2214:203a-27: yang na rang nyams dga' zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:203a-28: snying gar nyi la h'um bzhag ste /
T02D2214:203a-29: 'od kyis bgegs bsal khang pa dbub //
T02D2214:203a-31: sngags pa'i sgrub pa po chos bzhi dang ldan pas /
T02D2214:203a-32: lus la dran pa nye bar gzhag ste /
T02D2214:203a-33: thun mong dang khyad par gyi sems gnyis bskyed de //
T02D2214:203a-34: nang gi khrus stong par sems dpa' dang bcas par gzhag pa'o //
T02D2214:203a-35: des ni h'um ring por skad cig mas 'dong ba'i lha ru bsam pa'o //
T02D2214:203b-0: de la snying ga dang spyi bo dang mgrin @203b pa gsum du /
T02D2214:203b-1: ye shes bsgom pa dang bstim pa dang /
T02D2214:203b-2: ye shes pa ma lus shing lus pa med par bstim pa'o //
T02D2214:203b-3: 'od kyis bgegs bsal ni thugs rje dang ldan pa'i
T02D2214:203b-4: sdang mig gis phyogs kun du blta zhes pa'i don
T02D2214:203b-5: dang 'brel to // des bka' bsgo ba ni rgyu gcig ma 'dug cig ;
T02D2214:203b-6: 'dir mthu ldan gyi khang pa yin no ba dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:203b-7: khang pa ni bskyed pa dang phyis bskyed pa'i tshig 'brel to //
T02D2214:203b-8: ma song ba la bdag 'od dkyil 'khor la phog ste /
T02D2214:203b-9: tsakra aom bhr'um h'um bhr'um sa bhr'um ha bhr'um aa
T02D2214:203b-10: bhr'um gyis thog lnga yang nas yang du phab ste
T02D2214:203b-11: bsgral ba'o // khang pa dbub ni rang gi nyi
T02D2214:203b-12: ma'i 'bar ba'i h'um las 'od zer la ha ljang
T02D2214:203b-13: gu kha dog sna tshogs pa phyogs bcur 'phros te
T02D2214:203b-14: bsgral ba'o // / rdo rje'i khang pa phyogs bzhi
T02D2214:203b-15: ru kha dog dkar po dang kha dog lngar grub
T02D2214:203b-16: bsgral ba'o // / par gyur pa'o // h'um h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D2214:203b-17: aom badzra tsakra h'um h'um zhes brjod pa dang badzra ha na ha na zhes pa dang /
T02D2214:203b-18: badzra dzva la ram gyis 'khor lo'i khang pa dang /
T02D2214:203b-19: mda' dang mtshon cha'i khang pa dang /
T02D2214:203b-20: me'i srung bar shin tu 'thas par grub pa'o //
T02D2214:203b-21: bsrung ba grub nas bgegs gso ba ni //
T02D2214:203b-22: snying rje dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2214:203b-23: mig g-yas pa'i ram gyis sdig pa bsregs te zhi ba'o //
T02D2214:203b-24: g-yon pa'i aas kun gzhi gsos te /
T02D2214:203b-25: gsad pa'i dogs pa dang bcas pas bros te byer ba'o //
T02D2214:203b-27: de 'od las byung nyi dkyil du //
T02D2214:203b-28: slob dpon sangs rgyas bcas spyan drangs //
T02D2214:203b-29: phyag 'tshal mchod nas sdig pa bshags //
T02D2214:203b-30: sdom pa bzung dang yi rang dang //
T02D2214:203b-31: bsngo dang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed de //
T02D2214:203b-33: nyi ma'i h'um las 'od zer 'phros te /
T02D2214:203b-34: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can la
T02D2214:203b-35: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis don byas ye
T02D2214:203b-36: shes ba'i thugs kar thim snying po de nyid drangs
T02D2214:203b-37: te / bdag gi rgyud la phog pas sgrib pa bzhi dag nas /
T02D2214:203b-38: rgyud rang gos phyir bzlog pa bzhin du gyur pa'o //
T02D2214:203b-39: de 'di ni rang gi snying gi bdag po yis /
T02D2214:203b-40: seng ge la sogs pa'i gdan la /
T02D2214:203b-41: bdag po 'od kyi bla ma dang /
T02D2214:203b-42: sangs rgyas spyan drangs te gzhug pa'o //
T02D2214:204a-0: phyag btsal ba ni lus ngag yid kyis sam yid ces pa dang @204a * //
T02D2214:204a-2: mchod pa ni phyi nang gsang ba ste /
T02D2214:204a-5: dbul ba'i gnas tha dad du mchod pa'o //
T02D2214:204a-6: nang gi lha mo rnams kyis rang gi rtsas rang rang gis gcig tu'o //
T02D2214:204a-7: gsang ba ni lha pho mo'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2214:204a-8: gsum ga phyag rgya chen po gsang bas mnyes pas gsang ba'o //
T02D2214:204a-9: de gong ma'i don rnams kun stong pa blan med pa'o //
T02D2214:204a-10: sdig pa bshags pa ni gsum las gsum gyis gsum
T02D2214:204a-11: po rang rang du ma'i 'chab cing 'gyod pa dang
T02D2214:204a-12: bcas pas bshags shing phyis mi bya ba dang 'brel
T02D2214:204a-13: to // sdom pa gzung ba ni spyi dang khyad
T02D2214:204a-14: par de blangs pa'i don las phyis mi 'da' ste
T02D2214:204a-15: to // / yi dam dngos su blang zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:204a-16: yi rang ba ni spyi dang khyad par te bla
T02D2214:204a-17: na med pa'i lam la gos sngon po'i chos 'di
T02D2214:204a-18: las lhag pa gzhan su yang yod ma yin te
T02D2214:204a-19: / khyad par don zhes pa dang 'brel par yongs su gzung bas //
T02D2214:204a-20: de dang 'brel ba'i nus pa khyad par can thob ces pa'o //
T02D2214:204a-21: des ni de'i stong pa mi 'gro bar gzhug pa dang /
T02D2214:204a-22: 'bras bu med pa'i dogs pa byang chub tu yan lag bdun pa bsngo'o //
T02D2214:204a-23: skyabs 'gro ni phyi ma'i lha yongs su bcad de
T02D2214:204a-24: khyad par 'phags pa gos sngon can la bdag nyid
T02D2214:204a-25: 'dud cing / sems can ma lus lus pa med pa'i don byas shing /
T02D2214:204a-26: bdag nyid skyabs zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:204a-27: sems bskyed de zhes pa la /
T02D2214:204a-28: byang chub sems dpa' rigs kyi bu'am bu mos lam la gnas pa /
T02D2214:204a-29: sa gcig pas gnyis pa dang gsum bskyed cing 'dzeg pa ste /
T02D2214:204a-30: gong gi dge shul gyi dge ba dang ba ma
T02D2214:204a-31: lus pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad 'khor
T02D2214:204a-32: ba las bsgral zhes pa'i don dang 'brel lo //
T02D2214:204a-33: da ni lam gyi sems bskyed ni /
T02D2214:204a-34: dge ba khyad par can thob ces pa'i don dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:204a-35: de rnams rgyu ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshan dang
T02D2214:204a-36: dpe byad mang po thob ces pa'i don dang 'brel
T02D2214:204a-37: to // tshad med bzhi po sngon btang nas //
T02D2214:204a-39: byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi rim pas bsgoms te /
T02D2214:204b-0: sems can dang bdag rang 'brel pa'i bdag pos rgyu dang glan @204b zhes pa'o ;
T02D2214:204b-1: / sbrul pa dpag tu med pas sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2214:204b-2: 'bras bu mthun pa sbul pa'i nus pa zhes pa
T02D2214:204b-3: dang thams cad yongs su dag pa las zhes pa
T02D2214:204b-4: la / ye shes tshogs de stong pa nyid dam
T02D2214:204b-5: sngags la sogs pas phyi nang ma lus pa stong
T02D2214:204b-6: pa nyid du gnas pa ste /
T02D2214:204b-7: spros pa dang bral pas chos sku'i rgyu zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2214:204b-8: de rnams rgyu ste sngon du bya ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2214:204b-9: sngags bskyed 'byung ba gzhas yas bcas //
T02D2214:204b-10: nyi steng zhes bya ba'i don la //
T02D2214:204b-11: rdo rje bsrung ba blo rab rnams la ni /
T02D2214:204b-12: gong ni gong gi dag pas stong pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2214:204b-13: phyis gzhal yas khang grub pa'i dus su srung yang
T02D2214:204b-14: snang la rnal 'byor pa blo brten no zhes pa
T02D2214:204b-15: dang 'brel / tha ma'i gang zag rnams la ni /
T02D2214:204b-16: dang po yod pa'i blo brtan pa'i khang ba grong gi rkyen gyis mi g-yo ste /
T02D2214:204b-17: blo bye brag yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2214:204b-18: sngags bskyed ni yam dang ram dang bam lam sum
T02D2214:204b-19: las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim pas bskyed ces pa'i
T02D2214:204b-20: don to // ri rab la sogs pa'i khang par rang gi kha dog dang mthun pa'o //
T02D2214:204b-21: de steng bh'um las gzhal yas khang ba rin po
T02D2214:204b-22: che lnga las brtsigs pa sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad
T02D2214:204b-23: pa / rta babs bzhi dang zur bzhi pa /
T02D2214:204b-24: phyi dang nang gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2214:204b-25: dur khrod brgyad kyis nye bar klu bas pa /
T02D2214:204b-26: dur khrod brgyad ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2214:204b-27: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis shing
T02D2214:204b-28: dang mchod rten dang lha dang klu dang sprin dang
T02D2214:204b-29: / phyogs kyi bdag po rnams mchod pa'o //
T02D2214:204b-30: ro gsar rnying rtog pa med pa dang /
T02D2214:204b-32: kang ka mchu rings kyi bya dang /
T02D2214:204b-33: mi rtog pa dang phra mo rtog pa sel ba'o //
T02D2214:204b-35: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su seng+ge dang padma nyi zla'i gdan bskyed pa'o //
T02D2214:204b-37: de las dpal ldan gnyis kyi bdag / rig pa yod med thun mong bzlog / ces pa la ;
T02D2214:204b-38: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rang bzhin /
T02D2214:204b-39: rkyen gyi ngo bo h'um du snang ba'o //
T02D2214:204b-40: de'i 'od zer gyis las gnyis byas /
T02D2214:204b-41: sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhugs nas /
T02D2214:204b-42: thugs kyi rang bzhin dang h'um ring por gyur pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-0: @205a * // mchog dang thun mong gi bdag po sprul sku ru snang ba'o //
T02D2214:205a-1: rig ma yod med thun mong bzlog ni /
T02D2214:205a-2: yum yod na mchog gi 'bras bu shas che ste grib ma bzhin grub ces pa'i don to //
T02D2214:205a-3: rig ma med pa ni thun mong dang 'brel te yum med pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-4: mthing nag gos sngon sku la gsol //
T02D2214:205a-5: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
T02D2214:205a-6: sbrul zhags bzhis lus rnam par brgyan //
T02D2214:205a-7: spyan dmar mche gtsigs sbrul zhags za //
T02D2214:205a-8: gsus khyem che zhing 'jigs pa can //
T02D2214:205a-10: mthing ga ru byung ba ni don stong pa nyid la 'gyur ba med pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-11: gos sngon sku la gsol ba ni //
T02D2214:205a-12: rigs 'dzin pa dar ljang gu'i kha cag can no //
T02D2214:205a-13: rdo rje dril bu ni g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa la khyung lnga dang /
T02D2214:205a-14: rigs lnga'i sa bon bkod pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-15: g-yon shes rab kyi rang bzhin dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-16: sbrul bzhis lus la brgyan pa ni /
T02D2214:205a-17: rgyal rigs dang rje'u dmar po dang /
T02D2214:205a-18: bram ze dkar po dmangs rigs nag pos rna cha la sogs pa byas pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-19: spyan dmar ba ni sems can chags pa zhes pa'i don te /
T02D2214:205a-20: gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa yang zhes bya'o //
T02D2214:205a-21: mche ba gtsigs pa ni bdud bzhi dang sdang ba 'dul ba ste don byed pa'i rtags so //
T02D2214:205a-22: gsus pa che ba ni stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba'i don to //
T02D2214:205a-23: 'jigs pa can ni gshe ba'am dpa' la sgeg pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-24: de gsal mdun du dkyil 'khor dgug / mchod dang gtor mas mnyes byas nas //
T02D2214:205a-25: bdag byin brlab pa'i gsol ba gdab //
T02D2214:205a-26: dbang thob gyur nas gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2214:205a-28: dam tshig pa'i rgyan cha dang phyag mtshan gsal nas /
T02D2214:205a-29: h'um gi 'od kyis 'og min nas ye shes lha tshogs dgug ces pa dang 'brel te /
T02D2214:205a-30: badzra sa manta dza: zhes pas so //
T02D2214:205a-31: ye shes pa dang lhan cig pa'i bgegs badzra yaksha h'um phat /
T02D2214:205a-33: de la bdag don sngon du 'gro bas mchod yon dang yid kyi mchod pa dbul zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-34: gzhan la ni phyi mchod dngos dang gtor ma sman gyis mchod la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D2214:205a-35: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D2214:205b-0: ae ma dpal ldan gos @205b sngon can //
T02D2214:205b-1: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2214:205b-2: lus kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2214:205b-3: bdag lus bde gshegs skur byin rlobs //
T02D2214:205b-4: ngag dang yid la yang yang brjod //
T02D2214:205b-5: de nas gnas gsum du aom dang a'a:dang h'um dkar
T02D2214:205b-6: po dang dmar po dang mthing ga gnas su bltas
T02D2214:205b-7: te / 'bru gsum las 'od langs te sngom ma
T02D2214:205b-8: mam kam ngag 'od nag po bsdus te bsregs shing
T02D2214:205b-9: sbyang ste des ni kun gzhi la bag chags yod
T02D2214:205b-10: pa'i mdze'i sa bon yang sbyangs shing bsregs nas /
T02D2214:205b-11: rang rang gi phyag mtshan dang sku ru gnas su dgod pa la /
T02D2214:205b-12: ye shes pa bstim pa ni rang gi bdag po'o //
T02D2214:205b-13: yang 'od kyis mdun na gnas pa dang /
T02D2214:205b-14: rigs lnga sangs rgyas gnas nas bstims pa'o //
T02D2214:205b-15: dbang thob ni bla mas rigs kyi bdag po bskul te /
T02D2214:205b-16: rigs lngas shar nas chu'i dbang dang /
T02D2214:205b-17: me long gsal ba rgyud la bstim pa dang /
T02D2214:205b-18: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2214:205b-19: lho nas dbu rgyan gyis mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D2214:205b-20: nga rgyal lam ser sna sel ba'o //
T02D2214:205b-21: nub nas rdo rje ni so sor rtog pas 'dod chags sel ba'o //
T02D2214:205b-22: de nas dril bus bya ba ye shes dang phrag dog sel /
T02D2214:205b-23: dbus nas ming dang rdo rje dril bu gti mug sel cing khyab bya ba stim pa'o //
T02D2214:205b-24: ti la mar la mar bskus khyab pa bzhin te /
T02D2214:205b-25: thob pa ni dbu la rigs lngas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2214:205b-26: yang bdag po dang rigs lnga sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2214:205b-27: thig le aam dang h'um gi rnam par thugs rje chen po'i dang du zhu nas /
T02D2214:205b-28: guhya aa bhi shinytsa zhes pa dang /
T02D2214:205b-29: slob mas aa ho su kha brjod nas /
T02D2214:205b-30: lce la byin pa dag las gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dag ste /
T02D2214:205b-31: sngags zlos pa nus pa mthu can du gyur nas /
T02D2214:205b-32: gsung dbyangs yan lag brgyad cu'am /
T02D2214:205b-33: drug cu dang ldan te lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin du song ba'o //
T02D2214:205b-34: dbang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i yon tan 'og nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02D2214:205b-36: mchog rnams kyis ni gsum pa dang bzhi pa rim pas blangs te /
T02D2214:205b-37: phyag rgya chen po'i dang la gnas pa las /
T02D2214:205b-38: phyogs bcur lha mos gsol ba btab ste /
T02D2214:205b-39: yan lag lnga'i tshul gyis sku langs te /
T02D2214:205b-40: sngags blas zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:206a-1: ba rnam gnyis rags dang phra //
T02D2214:206a-3: gsal ba gnyis ni gtso bo dang rten gzhal yas khang dang srung ba gsal ba'o //
T02D2214:206a-4: rags pa ni gtso bo gsal ba ste /
T02D2214:206a-5: phyi sku mdog dang rgyan cha gsal ba'o //
T02D2214:206a-6: phra ba ni nang gi sems dpa' sum brtsegs gsal ba'o //
T02D2214:206a-7: des ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa'o //
T02D2214:206a-8: rgyud spyong rags dang phra ba'o //
T02D2214:206a-9: rags pa gnyis te ba thag dang //
T02D2214:206a-10: ba thag med do gnyi ga la //
T02D2214:206a-11: mag la me phreng ba nyi ma'i tshul //
T02D2214:206a-13: rgyud sbyangs pa'i bzlas pa la rags par bzlas pa dang phra bar bzlas pa'o ;
T02D2214:206a-14: / rags pa ba thag yod par zlos pa ni /
T02D2214:206a-15: lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa dus mnyam du snying
T02D2214:206a-16: ga nas sdom mam kam 'od phung du 'thon te
T02D2214:206a-17: sarba p'a pam au tsa ta ya zhes pa dang
T02D2214:206a-18: 'brel to // gong gi ma lus pa lte bar
T02D2214:206a-19: ram las mes bsreg da ha dzva la ram zhes
T02D2214:206a-21: thal ba ma lus spyi bo nas ham dkar pos chu rgyun phab ste /
T02D2214:206a-22: shuddho& ham zhes pa'i don dang 'brel te yid dang ngag gi las so //
T02D2214:206a-23: ba thag yod pa ni lus ngag yid yo 'od
T02D2214:206a-24: kyi skud pas sbrel pa'i tshul de bdag po'i sngags
T02D2214:206a-25: las shes pa'i 'od kyi skud pas sbrel nas 'don
T02D2214:206a-27: ba thag med pa ni 'od kyi skud pa sbrel ba ma yin 'od zer gyis /
T02D2214:206a-28: lus ngag yid gsum gyi las kyi 'bras bu 'byar la ma reg par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2214:206a-29: des ni 'bras dang ye mo rlung gis 'byed pa bzhin no //
T02D2214:206a-30: mgal me ni bar ma chad pa'o //
T02D2214:206a-31: phreng ba ni yig 'brul 'od zer zhon pa'o //
T02D2214:206a-32: nyi ma ni 'od zer lus yo la ba dal ba'o //
T02D2214:206a-33: phra ba yang gsum du byung ba ni /
T02D2214:206a-34: h'um skul sreg pa ram yin te //
T02D2214:206a-35: lte bar ba krub spyi bo aa //
T02D2214:206a-37: phra ba gsum du byung ba ni /
T02D2214:206a-38: dus mnyam du ma yin te lus ngag yid kyi
T02D2214:206a-39: sgrib pa re mos zhes par snying ga nas sdom
T02D2214:206a-40: mam sdig par bton lte ba ram mer sreg /
T02D2214:206a-41: spyi bo aas bsregs pa'i thal ba bkru zhes pa'o
T02D2214:206a-42: // ngag gi kam nag po zhib mor snying gnas
T02D2214:206a-43: bton lte bar sreg spyi bo nas bkru zhes pa'o
T02D2214:206a-44: // // yid kyi 'od dpung du bton pa dang
T02D2214:206a-45: bsreg pa dang bkru zhes pa'i gong du bshad par
T02D2214:206b-0: // // bsams te / kun gzhi'i sgrib pa @206b sbyang zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:206b-1: mtshan ma 'dod pa rnam pa lnga //
T02D2214:206b-2: yum la bskor ba rnam gsum dang //
T02D2214:206b-3: ye bdag rnam pa gsum zhes pa la /
T02D2214:206b-4: mtshan ma 'dod pa lnga zlos lugs lnga'o //
T02D2214:206b-5: yum la bskor ba rnam gsum ni //
T02D2214:206b-6: dam tshig pa yab yum dang ye shes gtso bo
T02D2214:206b-7: gcig po ste thugs dang 'og sgo yang gzung ngo
T02D2214:206b-8: // ye shes pa dang rnam pa gsum ni ye
T02D2214:206b-9: shes yab yum dang dam tshig pa gtso bo ste
T02D2214:206b-10: gong dang gong bzlog ces pa'o //
T02D2214:206b-12: bdag bskor nyi bskor tha ma ni //
T02D2214:206b-13: snying gar bskor ro mtshan ma 'byung //
T02D2214:206b-16: zhes pa la 'khor yum can gtso bo yum med do //
T02D2214:206b-17: bdag rang gi bzlas pa la yum yod na yum dang 'khor ba dang /
T02D2214:206b-18: yum med na snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i rdo rje h'um can la bzlas pa ste /
T02D2214:206b-19: mgal me'i phreng ba nyi ma ni yo la sbyor ba'o //
T02D2214:206b-20: grangs ni 'bum dang nyis 'bum sum 'bum dang bdun 'bum dang /
T02D2214:206b-21: bye ba dang nyi shu dang /
T02D2214:206b-22: lus ngag yid gsum re re spyir gcig ste /
T02D2214:206b-24: de ni grangs kyi bsnyen pa skyel ba ste /
T02D2214:206b-25: 'od zer dkar po sgrib pa sbyang //
T02D2214:206b-27: nye bsnyen ye shes pa la 'od kyis mchod nas /
T02D2214:206b-28: las dang sgrib pa sbyong ba ste 'od zer dkar
T02D2214:206b-29: po chu rgyun can dang 'brel te ye shes bstim
T02D2214:206b-31: bsgrub pa yang 'od zer dkar dmar te /
T02D2214:206b-32: dmar pos bsreg cing dkar pos 'khrud de dpe nyi ma bzhin no //
T02D2214:206b-33: bgrang ba'i snying po yang gtso bo'i snying po dngos drag sngags 'brel bas bzlas zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:206b-34: bsgrub pa chen po'i bzlas pa yang bsgrub pa'i snying
T02D2214:206b-35: ga'i h'um las me 'phro ba'i rnam pa lte bar
T02D2214:206b-36: ram las 'bar ba sor bzhi dang mtho gang khru
T02D2214:206b-37: gang mchod de mes 'bar zhing bsreg 'phros pas yas
T02D2214:206b-39: gdon gyi nus mthu dang gdon gyi gnod sems me stag 'thor zhing 'phros bsregs te /
T02D2214:206b-40: ye shes pa dang 'phro 'du sngags kyis kyang me'i
T02D2214:206b-41: rang bzhin gyis dus gcig par drag po tshul du
T02D2214:207a-0: 'tshig pa'o // rnam par smin pa'i lus bsregs ye shes phyag rdor gyur ye shes bstim @207a * //
T02D2214:207a-2: bgrang ba'i snying po yang aom badzra p'a ni ma
T02D2214:207a-3: h'a yaksha n'i l'amba radh'a ra ni badzra h'um phat
T02D2214:207a-4: / aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um
T02D2214:207a-5: phat h'a pa aom sv'a khri go bzlog bzlas pa'o
T02D2214:207a-7: bzlas pa'i sngags 'di rnams kyis bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob /
T02D2214:207a-8: mdze la sogs te nad kyi thug rdu 'byin //
T02D2214:207a-9: gnod pa'i bgegs la 'chi snyam pa 'byung /
T02D2214:207a-10: bros te 'gro ba sdug bsngal thams cad las ther
T02D2214:207a-11: bar 'ong snyam pa dang dngos grub kun dang 'brel
T02D2214:207a-12: zhes pa ste / des ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro ;
T02D2214:207a-14: mtshan ma byung 'od sgra sku ston sgyur bzlog ni /
T02D2214:207a-15: sngags grub pa dang nang thon pa dang /
T02D2214:207a-16: gdon thub pa ste gos sngon po gon pa dang
T02D2214:207a-17: me tog sngon po thu ba la sogs pa dang
T02D2214:207a-18: / lus las rang khrag thon pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2214:207a-19: nya sbal la sogs pa rid cing me nad bsregs pa'o //
T02D2214:207a-22: dga' mi dga' sems dang bral pa'i sgyu mas bzlog ces pa'o //
T02D2214:207a-23: bskyed rim pa kun brtags lam du bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2214:207a-24: de rjes sangs rgyas lung ston ni sprul sku dngos chos ston te /
T02D2214:207a-25: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i man ngag dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:207a-26: grogs ni khrus dang sreg dang tsha //
T02D2214:207a-27: bdud rtsi tshogs dang gtor mas bya //
T02D2214:207a-28: de nas gser la sogs pa grub pa la //
T02D2214:207a-29: bskyed rdzogs kyi grogs bstan pa yin te /
T02D2214:207a-30: khrus ni phyi dang nang ngo //
T02D2214:207a-31: de gnyis kyis thams cad bdag ces pa'o //
T02D2214:207a-32: phyi dri lnga rig pas dag ces pa'o //
T02D2214:207a-33: nad kun kyang sel ba mi rtog pa'i sreg pa ste /
T02D2214:207a-35: des dngos grub bzhi grub pa'i phyir sbyin sreg go //
T02D2214:207a-36: tshe ni phyi tshe dang nor rnam thos bu dang 'brel pas nor 'phel zhing tshe brtan pa'o //
T02D2214:207a-37: nang gi tshe rin po che ga bu'i nang du brtan zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:207a-38: bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsi'i rnam pa lnga dang 'brel pa ste /
T02D2214:207a-39: rkyang pa'am bcud len gyi sgrub thabs dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:207a-40: tshogs kyi tshogs 'khor dang dpa' bo'i ston mo dang /
T02D2214:207a-41: tshogs mchod de tshogs kyi man ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D2214:207b-0: gtor ma ni phyi dang @207b nang ngo //
T02D2214:207b-1: drug po des gser la sogs pa 'grub ste /
T02D2214:207b-2: thun mong gi dngos grub rnams so //
T02D2214:207b-3: de yum lcang lo can gyi rgyud nas /
T02D2214:207b-4: ril bu rkang mgyogs mig sman dang //
T02D2214:207b-5: gter dang dgra bo char gcod dang //
T02D2214:207b-6: gnod sbyin mo dang bdud rtsi len //
T02D2214:207b-7: ral gri 'jig rten dngos grub chen po brgyad //
T02D2214:207b-8: bzlas pa tshogs dang gtor ma rnams kyis 'grub //
T02D2214:207b-9: ces rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
T02D2214:207b-10: mchog 'dod pa yi sems can gyis /
T02D2214:207b-11: snying ga'i sbyor ba gsum gyi rtsa //
T02D2214:207b-12: yi ge thig les yang dag mtshan //
T02D2214:207b-13: zhes pa la sogs pa'i man ngag ston pa yin te /
T02D2214:207b-14: mchog 'dod pa'i 'bras bu bla na med pa phyag rgya chen po 'dod pa'o //
T02D2214:207b-15: sems can ni de bsgrub pa'i gang zag sngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2214:207b-16: snying ga sbyor ba ni spyi bo dang mgrin pa
T02D2214:207b-17: dang snying ga dang lte ba dang me long do
T02D2214:207b-19: bcu drug dang brgyad dang drug cu'o //
T02D2214:207b-20: gsum ni aa wa dh'u t'i la la n'a ra
T02D2214:207b-21: sa n'a 'ja' tshon gyi tshul du gnas zhes pa'o
T02D2214:207b-22: // yi ge'i thig le ni a'a li nyis lnga ba dang /
T02D2214:207b-25: k'a li nyis lnga ba 'khor lo la'o //
T02D2214:207b-27: g-yas na a'a li g-yon na k'a li'i thig le 'khyags pa'i dngos so //
T02D2214:207b-28: dbus nas thabs dang shes rab 'bar //
T02D2214:207b-29: thig le bsam mo 'gro ba'i tshe //
T02D2214:207b-30: zhes pas dbus thabs dang shes rab 'bar ni snying
T02D2214:207b-31: gar nyi zla'i bar du aa thig le'i ngo bor
T02D2214:207b-33: aom a'a yam rim pas bsam ba ste thig le'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2214:207b-34: 'gro ba'i tshe ni rlung sngon po lngas gtum mo'i me bus te /
T02D2214:207b-35: stong pa nyid gsum gyi nang na yar me song ste /
T02D2214:207b-36: snying gar nyi zla gsum las snang stong gi me
T02D2214:207b-37: 'bar te bde ba chen po thob zhes pa'i don
T02D2214:207b-38: to // de nas yar la sangs rgyas zhing khams gzhan nas /
T02D2214:207b-39: byang chub ba chu'i ngo bo bkug nas rgyud brlan zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:207b-40: de na dbyu gu chu tshod 'pho ba thun gyi bar du bsgom zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:207b-41: dbang po gang dang gang gi rtsa //
T02D2214:207b-42: kha phye'i steng du thig le bsam //
T02D2214:207b-44: dbang po yul la 'phro bar gyur na /
T02D2214:208a-2: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa la kha phye ste /
T02D2214:208a-3: rang rang gi yul stod par me 'bar bar zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:208a-4: pa thag phug nas thig le la blo gtad nas /
T02D2214:208a-5: 'jug pa ba thag gzhi por thi ma //
T02D2214:208a-7: ba thag ni dngos por snang ba'i yul lo //
T02D2214:208a-8: thag pa dang 'dra bar 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2214:208a-9: phug nas ni snang ba lam du khyer ba ste //
T02D2214:208a-10: snang ba thig le rang bzhin du gyur ba'o //
T02D2214:208a-11: thim mo de la blo gtad ni snang ba dang stong pa gcig tu thim zhes pa'i don te /
T02D2214:208a-12: bden pa gnyis 'dres pa'i lam mo //
T02D2214:208a-13: de ni don stong pa ste /
T02D2214:208a-15: 'jug pa ba thag ni rnam shes 'pho 'jug ste /
T02D2214:208a-16: skye ba dang rmi lam dang srid par 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa'o //
T02D2214:208a-17: don gyi ngo bos gnas pas stong pa gcig nas gcig tu 'pho ba ste /
T02D2214:208a-18: rang bzhin gnas pa ni gcig gi shes pa'o //
T02D2214:208a-19: ba thag ni kun brtags kyi rtog pa'o //
T02D2214:208a-21: gzhi gnas pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid la ma la bu thim zhes pa ste /
T02D2214:208a-23: dbang po thig le med pa la //
T02D2214:208a-26: rlung rkyang pa la sgom pa ston pa yin te /
T02D2214:208a-27: dbang po thig le med pa ni /
T02D2214:208a-28: bu dang thig le mi sgom ste //
T02D2214:208a-29: rlung la rdo rje bzlas pa bya //
T02D2214:208a-31: rlung ni 'khor par bskyed pa'i rta yin pas /
T02D2214:208a-32: rlung nyid lam du bslang zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:208a-33: 'byung ba'i phyir lus las rlung 'byung ba ste ;
T02D2214:208a-35: zhes pa'i pa thag dang 'brel to //
T02D2214:208a-36: 'jug pa ni rlung lus la 'jug pa ste /
T02D2214:208a-37: nang du stong pa'i thig le chen po dang /
T02D2214:208a-39: 'jam pa nyid du yun ring du nang du bzla zhes bya'o //
T02D2214:208a-40: phra ba ni rlung dag pa'i rang bzhin phra bas
T02D2214:208a-41: kyang shin tu phra ba'i ngo bo la gnas pa'o
T02D2214:208a-42: // pa thag ni rtog pa'i me chu rab tu zhi ba las zhi ba'o //
T02D2214:208a-44: phyi nad du 'ong ba dang 'gro ba ste /
T02D2214:208a-45: sems gzung ba'i yud zad do //
T02D2214:208b-0: la @208b bzla phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur ni /
T02D2214:208b-1: la bzla ba ni sred pa'ang bla mar byas zhes pa ste /
T02D2214:208b-2: stong pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2214:208b-3: bden pa gnyis ka'i 'dzin pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D2214:208b-4: phyag rgya chen po ye shes sngon sor slebs pa'o //
T02D2214:208b-5: de nas mtha' bral stong par song pa ni //
T02D2214:208b-7: bla ma'i man ngag dang bral pa'i dbu ma yang 'bring po tsam nyid do //
T02D2214:208b-8: bla ma'i man ngag gis rab brgyan pa yi //
T02D2214:208b-9: rnam bcad yongs gcod med pa yi //
T02D2214:208b-10: bde ba ston pa chen po ni //
T02D2214:208b-11: rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D2214:208b-12: dngos grub 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2214:208b-14: 'di ni gang zag snod can las //
T02D2214:208b-15: gzhan la sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D2214:208b-17: 'di gzhung bla mas snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i
T02D2214:208b-18: man ngag yin pas gang zag snod can la bstan
T02D2214:208b-19: pa yin te / sgang bu dma' bzhin dad pa brtan //
T02D2214:208b-20: sems can 'gro ba'i don la dga'//
T02D2214:208b-21: thos pa mang ba yid ches brtan //
T02D2214:208b-22: brtson 'grus drag la bsam gtan mos //
T02D2214:208b-23: zab mo'i don la chog mi shes //
T02D2214:208b-24: tshogs dang tsha tsha la sogs pa //
T02D2214:208b-25: thar pa'i lam la shin tu mos //
T02D2214:208b-26: de la de yis bsgrub ces pa'o //
T02D2214:208b-27: smon lam dge rtsa bsngo legs pas //
T02D2214:208b-28: gsang ba zab mo'i don dang sprad ;
T02D2214:208b-30: dge ba bag chags stobs rnams skyes //
T02D2214:208b-31: thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar nges //
T02D2214:208b-32: gzhan yang gang zag phal ba rnams //
T02D2214:208b-33: sdug bsngal kun 'byung lam la rab gnas pas //
T02D2214:208b-34: dad pa zhan cing ngo tsha chud //
T02D2214:208b-36: zas nor chags pa'i dbang la mos //
T02D2214:208b-37: gsang ba'i don la mi mos shing //
T02D2214:208b-38: dkon mchog smod cing mi dge bcu la mos //
T02D2214:208b-39: lam log rtsa ba chad pa'i gang zag rnams la bstan na dam tshig nyams zhes pa'o //
T02D2214:208b-40: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams zhes pa nas /
T02D2214:208b-41: yongs su dag pa'i sa thob shog gi bar la rtsa ba na gsal bas ma bris so //
T02D2214:208b-42: bdag gis mthong lam sa ni dang po thob //
T02D2214:208b-43: 'phags pa gos sngon can gyi dngos grub ma thob kyang //
T02D2214:208b-44: aa mri ta yi me tog rtsi 'khor bzhin //
T02D2214:208b-45: rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yi dngos grub 'dod pa dang //
T02D2214:209a-0: @209a * // bcom ldan rdo rje can la mos pa'i dad shugs dang //
T02D2214:209a-1: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis kun nas bdag bskul to //
T02D2214:209a-2: smon lam dbang gis klu sgrub man ngag dran //
T02D2214:209a-3: bdag 'dra blo chung dman pas brtsams par mi rigs kyang //
T02D2214:209a-4: dad pa'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i 'grel pa brtsams//
T02D2214:209a-5: tshig dang don la nyes ba shor srid na //
T02D2214:209a-6: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang yang //
T02D2214:209a-7: n'a g'a rdzu na la sogs bla ma dam pa rnams //
T02D2214:209a-8: bdag 'dra blo zhan dbang gis bzod par gsol //
T02D2214:209a-9: bdag 'dra blo zhan shes rab chub ba dang //
T02D2214:209a-10: gang zag mchog rab snying po don la rab tu mos pa rnams //
T02D2214:209a-11: dngos grub thob pa'i chos su bdag gis bris //
T02D2214:209a-12: gsal ba mi gsal rtsa rab don rnams kun //
T02D2214:209a-13: bdag gis 'grel tig 'bru ru gsal bar byas //
T02D2214:209a-14: thar pa thob byed lam ni rab tu snang //
T02D2214:209a-15: blo zhan sems can dman la phan pa dang //
T02D2214:209a-16: bla ma'i man ngag brgyud pa gsal 'bar phyir //
T02D2214:209a-17: zab mo'i don dang sbyar nas bdag gis bris //
T02D2214:209a-18: 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod gyur pa des //
T02D2214:209a-19: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
T02D2214:209a-20: dge bcu dal 'byor lam la rab brtson zhing //
T02D2214:209a-21: drod dang rtse mo mchog mthong ye shes rnams //
T02D2214:209a-22: ma lus myur du bdag gis bgrod pa dang //
T02D2214:209a-23: las dang chos kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams //
T02D2214:209a-24: kun rdzob don dam tshul du rab gnas te //
T02D2214:209a-25: sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad dang rab bral nas //
T02D2214:209a-26: 'bras bu shu ba g-yan pa mdze la sogs //
T02D2214:209a-27: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams rtsad nas zhi ba dang//
T02D2214:209a-28: dag pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dang //
T02D2214:209a-29: 'phags pa gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog /
T02D2214:209a-30: mchog rab snying bo rtsa ba'i man ngag padma 'byung
